I have 2k hours on this game. I love this game, but there's one fatal flaw. At 200fps, and 0% Choke my game stutters. This has happened between multiple computers and multiple GPUs. I've gone on every YouTube video and every Reddit post about this. I can't find a fix to this issue. i'm not the only one this happens to either. It only happens ab 30% of the time, but it makes the game unplayable. This has been happening since 2016. It ruins a perfectly good match. 

Will update review if this gets fixed.
